title: Is it possible to learn Urdu for free from home? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it is. There are lots of online sites and courses to learn urdu. Learn Urdu for freefast, free and easy using book2 by "50 languages"Learn Urdu - Quick Online LearningThese are few but if you google it you might find many more and these are online sites, there are even free mobile apps to learn urdu for free.

Absolutely. There are plenty of free resources if you look for it. I would suggest apps like Beginner Urdu or StartFromZero_Urdu to get yourself started with the commonly used Urdu words and phrases. Beginner Urdu - Android Apps on Google Play StartFromZero_Urdu - Android Apps on Google Play
